thread.section_title: The Chess Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location (especially for shopping!)
thread.title_full: Great Location (especially for shopping!) - Review of The Chess Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ZTALiz
title: Great Location (especially for shopping!)
text:
Unique little hotel, cute themes and rooms (small, but that's normal for Paris).
Uber fare to/from airport is about 40Euro, might be more w traffic.
Staff was fabulous. Breakfast was only 'ok' and the biggest drawback for me was no fitness center. They informed me that I could go across the street but it would be 40 Euro!
Location is stellar, a block from Galleries Lafayette :)
